Title: Standard zero-free regions for Rankin–Selberg L-functions via sieve theory
Abstract: © 2018, The Author(s).We give a simple proof of a standard zero-free region in the t-aspect for the Rankin–Selberg L-function L(s, π× π~) for any unitary cuspidal automorphic representation π of GL n(AF) that is tempered at every nonarchimedean place outside a set of Dirichlet density zero.
